transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hanji bhai.
Executive: Ji good afternoon sir, Amrit baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Very good afternoon, aap theek ho?
Customer: Main theek hun ji.
Customer: Divert rakha aapne number pe uske darad aa raha hai kisi se call aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi abhi aapne call kara tha to call to mujhe reflect hua tha main dusre call par tha us time par wo dusre client ki call aa gayi thi jab.
Customer: Aapke jo personal number hai na us pe darad aa raha hai kisi se call aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan chalo nahi koi issue nahi mujhe bata dijiye.
Customer: Kya kya hua hamara?
Executive: Aapka jo kal I think video meet par aapki baat hui hogi jo hamari technical team hai unke sath.
Executive: To unhone jo solution I think nikal kar diya tha wo Airtel par aapka kaam kar raha tha.
Executive: Uske baad Jio par kaam nahi kar raha tha wo bhi wifi wifi par kaam kar raha tha right?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan to abhi aapne uske baad check kiya Jio par kaam kar raha hai abhi nahi kar raha hai sir?
Customer: Hello hai?
Executive: Jio par ab kaam kar raha hai nahi kar raha hai Jio ke network par?
Customer: Kaam kar raha hai tabhi main phone kyun karta phir.
Executive: Achcha aur Airtel pe chala raha tha kal wo?
Customer: Ye ye kisi ko mangna padta hai Airtel ka ye 5 minute 10 minute to usi pe aise hi thodi kaam thodi chalega us pe.
Executive: Wo to nahi chalne ka sir.
Executive: To abhi kal jo hai wo theek kar rakha tha.
Customer: Haan bolna sir.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan to abhi jo hai usme senior bhi jo hamare sabse yahan par senior hai jo head hai hamare wo bhi involved hai unhone bhi jo hai main jo unke senior hote hai jo app testing jo karte hai.
Executive: Unko bhi loop karke mail dal rakha hai aur wo aapko iska resolution nikal ke jald se jald provide kar denge aaj subah bhi unko unke liye mail update kara hai.
Executive: And wo hamari team jo technical team hai wo aapse throughout connect karti rahengi and yahan tak ye jo case hai kafi highlighted hai sir.
Executive: Aur kal bhi isse regarding mere senior se aapki baat hui hogi video meet par.
Executive: Jo aapne shayad video meet par apne issue dikhaya hoga.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello, main bol raha hun.
Customer: Aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi hai sir. Ke ye ye masla hai na.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Jis tarah pe saas lena.
Customer: Na solution masla hai pata kya masla kya hai.
Customer: Tu maal sarki braam watan ka.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Haan haan Amish.
Executive: Main issue jo aa raha tha sir Jio network ke sath aa raha hai Jio ke network par wo chal hi nahi raha.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan to Jio ke network ke upar nahi chal raha to Jio ke Jio ke jo tester hai unse bhi wo coordinate karke matlab ye ki hamari jo team hai wo check chal rahi hai aur check karke aapko update kar denge sir to aap bilkul befikar ho jitni jaldi hoga utni jaldi sir solve karke denge.
Customer: Matlab ye cheez aapko sharam nahi aa rahi hai aap pichle char din se bol rahe ho ki hamara team check kar raha hai kya check kar raha hai kya check kar rahe hai abhi tak.
Executive: Sir maine khud aapko bataya tha mere hath me rehta ye cheeze to main pehle kar deta mere hath me nahi hai ye cheeze.
Executive: Ye technical cheeze hai wo technical team hi kar sakti hai ye cheez sir wo continue wo lagi hui hai.
Customer: Matlab uska matlab technical technical team ko ye kabhi theek nahi hoga to uska matlab hum aise paise dete rahenge aur aap aise hi chalate rahoge.
Executive: Sir aisa to nahi hai ki theek nahi hoga wo ho jayega theek thoda samay lag raha hai kyunki issue jo core issue hum abhi find out nahi kar pa rahe honge iski wajah se.
Executive: Aisa to nahi hai ki sir maine mana kar diya ki theek nahi hoga aur theek karke nahi denge jo unko core find out mil jata to ye ye aise aise nahi chalega bhai dekho hamara ye hai ki.
Customer: Ab main maine bhi Delhi gaon me kiya hai pichle 12 14 saal kaam kiya hai theek hai.
Customer: Ye cheeze jo mujhe aap samjha rahe ho na itna nahi hota hai usme theek hai.
Customer: Finally ha ek do ghante ka outage maan sakte hai.
Customer: Lekin itna jo jo aap bol rahe ho na itna bhi nahi hota hai.
Executive: To sir wo particular ke ek network par issue aa raha hai ek network par sahi kaam kar raha hai ek network par issue aa raha hai na sir aisa thodi ki sare network par ab issue aa raha hai sirf ek network pe issue aa raha hai to uske liye.
Customer: Iska matlab kya to aapko usi time bolna tha na ki hamara ye dal do dal do aapni website ki hamara khali network rahega Airtel.
Customer: Ye dal do aisi baat ya us time bolna tha jab jab humne registration ki na to us time bolna tha khali Airtel pe chalega aur kisi network pe nahi chalega hum capable nahi hai kisi aur network pe chalane ke.
Executive: Sir aap itne din se IndiaMART use kar rahe ho aisi problem pehli bar I think aapko face hui hogi aisa nahi hota hai.
Customer: Yaar main manta hun problem aati rahengi kyunki machinery hai technology hai chalti rahegi ha ye ye main manta hun.
Customer: Lekin aisa nahi hai na ki char din panch panch din tak problem rahegi.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Problem aayegi aur jayegi.
Executive: Aapki baat sahi hai ji sir.
Executive: Abhi.
Customer: Fir bhi do din abhi dusra din hai na kal se theek hai us ye ye problem to Friday ko aa gayi theek hai Friday bhi aap nahi kar pa rahe do din aapki chutti thi theek hai fir Monday aaj Tuesday.
Customer: Abhi tak wo solve nahi ho pa raha hai main aisa nahi karunga ki bande ko apne piche piche rakhunga ki aap mere piche piche raho aur mujhe apna ye network ka wifi de do.
Executive: Sir bilkul uske liye to hum khud aapse connect kar rahe hai aisa bhi to nahi hai sir aap khud bol rahe ho ki samne se hum khud aapse connect kar rahe hai jo aa raha hai aapse update update karwa rahe hai ya jo bhi hamare samne se aa rahi hai ki ye solution ho sakta hai to fir aapko wo solution offer kar rahe hai aisa bhi to nahi hai sir aapko update nahi kar rahe but sir samne solution bhi to aana chahiye ye solution ke liye.
summary:
Concerns:

- App not working on Jio network.

- Issue persists for four days.



Resolution:

- Technical team is working on the issue.

- Senior members are involved in resolving the issue.

- Updates will be provided as soon as possible.



Next Steps: 

- Technical team will provide resolution soon.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- jio network, technical issue, app, resolution
